name: Retrotron
description: Retrotron is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is part of the WebtrES club. With its nostalgic retro console box and classic buttons, Retrotron brings back the charm of old-school gaming. Equipped with sturdy foundry arms and legs, it is built to withstand any challenges that come its way. The classic screen allows Retrotron to display intricate waveforms and data with precision. With its fusion of vintage aesthetics and modern technology, Retrotron is a favorite among the members of WebtrES club.
